234820.name: Driver Fusion
234820.description:
THE BEST SOFTWARE TO UPDATE, BACKUP, CLEAN AND MONITOR THE DRIVERS AND DEVICES OF YOUR PC

You can download the demo for free and use some of the following features.

FEATURES

  • Health check
    Automatically update drivers, delete unused drivers, back up drivers, and uninstall disconnected devices to keep your PC reliable, secure, and up to date.

  • Scheduler
    Regularly check your PC for driver and device issues and get notified when problems on your computer need to be fixed.

  • Driver update
    Update your drivers from our database of over 35 million drivers and access all available driver versions for your device.

  • Driver cleaner
    Clean software and driver entries of a device to prevent and fix boot issues, stability problems, and reduced performance.

  • Device control
    Manage devices and drivers on your PC and easily fix errors with detailed information and a wide range of features.

  • Driver migration
    Export drivers for a Windows reinstall or to use on another PC, including those without internet, and install them effortlessly.

  • Device monitor
    Monitor the performance of your devices in real-time, including their temperature, usage, and speed. Keep track of your processor, graphics card, hard drive, and more.

  • Device identifier
    Identify the type, name, and manufacturer of known and unknown devices from our database of over 6 million devices.

  • Driver store
    Install and uninstall drivers from the Windows Driver Store, a secure location where drivers are stored for installation.

  • System report
    Create a detailed report on every driver and device on your PC, including a summary of your computer's essential components.

  • Advanced protection
    Protect your PC by automatically backing up your system files, settings, and desktop before any changes are made to your computer.

  • Desktop
    Back up your desktop icon positions and screen resolution to preserve your desktop layout.

  • Universal compatibility
    All drivers and devices on your PC are fully supported, regardless of the manufacturer.

  • Priority support
    Clear and comprehensive support is available whenever you need help.
